name: RetroVillaHero Alpha 0.004
description:
RetroVillaHero Alpha 0.004

Playing around with Gamemaker studio 2

Game is in development. It's my hobby project.

Activate sound by clicking with left mouse button on the speaker (top middle of the screen) in the first level

Use space to jump. Left and Right arrow to move. Press A for full screen. Press Escape to stop the game. Use mouse to select character.

Press up to purchase items with gold.

And press up at radio to change track. Only two loops available at this moment

Updates include: 
Change Radio music by pressing up neer radio
New charachters added
Flying cars added
Checkpoints added
Ladder Added

Play it and show me a screenshot of how much gold you collected.

send me a direct message on instagram.

https://www.instagram.com/heartbeathero
